# DataScannerViewController.QualityLevel.accurate

**Case**

A quality level that prioritizes recognition accuracy over speed.

## Declaration

```swift
case accurate
```

## Discussion

Use this quality level if you want to recognize smaller text and barcodes.

## Identifying quality levels

- **DataScannerViewController.QualityLevel.balanced**: A quality level that’s between fast and accurate.
- **DataScannerViewController.QualityLevel.fast**: A quality level that prioritizes recognition speed over accuracy.
